external_games.name: Eon Altar: Episode 3 - The Watcher in the Dark

name: Eon Altar: Episode 3 - The Watcher in the Dark
summary: Continue your quest, in Episode 2 of Eon Altar. A mysterious, powerful figure has saved you from the Guild Lord's attack and left you in the dark caves below the Catacombs. What does your mysterious benefactor want? And can he help you escape the Paths of Madness with your sanity intact?
